name: CATS Aviation
about: CATS Aviation is a premier provider of theoretical training for aspiring pilots, based in Luton, United Kingdom. Specializing in ATPL Theoretical Knowledge Training, CATS offers both in-house and virtual courses, ensuring students can complete the 13 UK and/or EASA ATPL theoretical knowledge exams. With a commitment to quality, CATS adheres to the ISO 9001 standard, ensuring high-quality education that meets customer and regulatory needs. The school provides updated study guides, audio-video content, and overview lectures to support comprehensive learning. CATS Aviation is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals through rigorous and well-structured training programs.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Instrument Rating (IR)
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
